sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(187, 111, 59), rgb(0, 0, 0))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="220px"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/stage.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        app
        :style="`flex-direction: row;`"
    >
      <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
        <v-img
            v-bind="props"
            gradient="to top, rgba(0,0,0,.8), rgba(0,0,0,.2)"
        ></v-img>
      </template>
      <v-btn icon @click="drawer = true">
        <v-icon
          :size="iconsSize">
          mdi-menu
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-toolbar-title
          :style="`${this.toolbarTitleStyle}`">
        Heavify
      </v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
    <v-navigation-drawer
        v-model="drawer"
        absolute
        temporary
        color="primary"
    >
      <v-list
          nav
          dense
      >
        <v-list-item-group
            v-model="group"
            active-class="deep-purple--text text--accent-4"
        >
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-home</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title>Home</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title>Account</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
  </header>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      drawer: false
    }
  },
  computed: {
    iconsSize() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return 10;
        case 'sm': return 15;
        case 'md': return 20;
        case 'lg': return 25;
        case 'xl': return 30;
      }
    },
    toolbarTitleStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return "font-size:9px;position:relative;top: -6px !important;left: 12px !important;"
        case 'sm': return "font-size:12px;position:relative;top: -6px !important;left: 12px !important;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:16px;position:relative;top: -4px !important;left: 12px !important;"
        case 'lg': return "font-size:22px;position:relative;left: -15px !important;"
        case 'xl': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;top: 7px !important;left: 12px !important;"
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-toolbar__title {
    font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  }
</style>
